text: Andrew McLan "Andy" Fraser (3 July 1952 â€“ 16 March 2015) was an English songwriter and bass guitarist whose career lasted over forty years and includes a notable period as one of the founding members of the rock band Free in 1968, at age 15. Fraser died on 16 March 2015 at his home in California. He had been battling Cancer and AIDS. The cause of his death is under investigation. Fraser is survived by his daughters Hannah and Jasmine Fraser. ==References== ==Other websites== *Andy Fraser official website *Andy Fraser press kit * * Two-part exclusive interview with Andy Fraser on music and life. title: Andy Fraser
